TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 107
TEI.2.document_title: M M Battle to James and John Austin, 09-15-2010

barker_notes.barker_summary: Mills M. Battle in account with J. and J. Austin, September 16, 1828. Bill and price list.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 107

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Mills M. Battle in account with J. and J. Austin, September 16, 1828. Bill and price list.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Cotton Gin */location_mentioned*. *date_mentioned n="11-16-1828">Sepr 16 1828.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Mr. Mills M Battles*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*To*person_mentioned* J. and J Austin*/person_mentioned*— Dr.*/p*
*p*To 10 lbs Coffee Sent by *person_mentioned*Barret */person_mentioned*@ 4/c [four bits]------- 5.00*/p*
*p*15 To 20 lb Ditto @ 4/c-----------------------10.00*/p*
To 16 lbs. Suger e. 2/c-----------------------------------4.00
*p*To Your order on *person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned*----------------------------$19.00*/p*
*p*7.12 1/2*/p*
*p*$26.12 1/2*/p* *p*Deduct 2 lbs. coffee------------------------------------- 1. 00*/p*
*p*$25.12 1/2*/p*
*/div1*
